info.description: This API provides access to data on the Flux platform.
info.title: Flux API

tags.name: Service
tags.description: Health check and basic service operations, such as the ping endpoint.

tags.name: Organization
tags.description: Operations related to user management, roles, and permissions within organizations.

tags.name: Products
tags.description: Operations related to managing products, categories, and specifications.

tags.name: Currency
tags.description: Operations for handling currencies, conversions, and related financial data.

tags.name: Entity
tags.description: Operations concerning entities such as producers, carriers, marketers, and other stakeholders.

tags.name: Lines
tags.description: Operations related to infrastructure lines, including pipelines and rail lines.

tags.name: Facilities
tags.description: Operations managing facilities such as wells, terminals, plants, storages, and stations.

tags.name: Volumes
tags.description: Operations for managing volumes, including tickets, meters, and volume transactions.

Unauthorized.description: Unauthorized. The API key is missing or invalid.

Forbidden.description: Forbidden. The user does not have the necessary permissions.

InternalServerError.description: Something went wrong on the server.

get.summary: Check the server health.
get.description: Check the server health.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of users.
get.description: Retrieve a list of users.

get.summary: Retrieve a single user by ID.
get.description: Retrieve a single user by ID.

200.description: A single user with related roles and permissions.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of user roles.
get.description: Retrieve a list of user roles.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of user permissions.
get.description: Retrieve a list of user permissions.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of products.
get.description: Retrieve a list of products.

get.summary: Retrieve a single product by ID.
get.description: Retrieve a single product by ID.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of product categories.
get.description: Retrieve a list of product categories.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of product category specifications.
get.description: Retrieve a list of product category specifications.

200.description: A list of product category specifications.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of currencies.
get.description: Retrieve a list of currencies.

get.summary: Retrieve the live exchange rate.
get.description: Retrieve the live exchange rate.

parameters.name: from_currency
parameters.description: The symbol of the currency to convert from.

parameters.name: to_currency
parameters.description: The symbol of the currency to convert to.

200.description: The exchange rate between the two currencies.

error.example: You must include from_currency and to_currency as query params.
